page.title: 02Shops.
page.content: On Friday 3rd May 1985 St. Barnabas School did a survey about the shops in {Market Lavington.}There are 10 shops,a Co-op, Fruit and Veg, Post Office, Newsagents, Spar, Hardware, Shoe Shop, Drapers, Butchers and Photographers.We also have a Hairdresser, Bank, Library,four Public Houses, a Chapel and a Church called St.Mary's.We questioned people from 11.00 am to 11.30 am as they came out of the shops. It was discovered that the Co_op was the busiest shop during the time we were there. We questioned 48 people all together.22 people wanted a Chemist shop in Market Lavington. Others said they would like a Cobblers and a Bakers. 8 people liked it how it is.
